name: EchoStar Mobile Limited
membership: We are a member of the European Satellite Operators Association.
goal: To provide EU-wide mobile satellite services in the 2 GHz band with a complimentary ground component.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: The EU regime governing 2 GHz band mobile satellite service with a complimentary ground component.
